text: Yale financial aid awards meet 100% of demonstrated financial need without any loans. 64% of students receive financial assistance.

Yale x Flatiron School Web Development Bootcamp
We're glad you're interested in submitting an application to Yale Summer Session!
Date:The application for Summer 2020 will open on January 15, 2020.

Information found on these page will help answer your questions about applying to Yale Summer Session. Yale Summer Session accepts applications on a rolling basis once the application is open. Applications are considered incomplete until all supporting documents have been received by Yale Summer Session. Submitted applications will only be reviewed once they are complete. Once an application has been submitted a decision will be released within ten business days.
For the Flatiron, Acting Conservatory, Directing Workshop, and Yale Writers' Workshop, please visit the program pages for application information and deadlines.
Please use the links below to find the information you'll need to apply.
Application information for Yale College students applying to Yale Summer Session.
Information for visiting college students applying to Yale Summer Session.
Information for visiting international college students applying to Yale Summer Session.
Information for to pre-college (high school) students applying to Yale Summer Session.
This is information for beyond college applicants
Yale Center for International and Professional Experience

is a group of offices that work together, and with other academic advisers on campus, to support students throughout their four years at Yale as they make decisions about their academic plans and explore career options.

Elizabeth I holds court at the Center for British Art
Two paintings of the iconic monarch — including her earliest full-length portrait, painted circa 1567 — are on view for the first time in the United States.
The Yale Center for British Art holds the largest and most comprehensive collection of British art outside the United Kingdom.
View upcoming exhibitions, lectures, workshops, and guided tours.
The museum offers docent-led architecture, introductory, and special exhibition tours that are free to join throughout the year.

Discovering the earliest monumental Egyptian hieroglyphs

A joint Yale and Royal Museums of Art and History (Brussels) expedition uncovered previously unknown rock inscriptions, which include the earliest monumental hieroglyphs dating back around 5,200 years.

Seeking a degree? Or simply hoping to broaden your educational horizons?

You can earn undergraduate degrees at Yale College, master’s or doctoral degrees at the Graduate School of Arts & Sciences, and specialized degrees at our 12 professional schools. There are also many non-degree programs that allow individuals to study or pursue research without matriculating. Apply directly to the school or program where you wish to enroll.
Yale is committed to ensuring that qualified students are admitted without regard to their financial circumstances, and that they graduate without excessive debt.
for information about Yale College and advice for applicants.
Find information about our graduate and professional schools here.
We work to ensure that all qualified applicants have access to a Yale education.
We offer financial aid to international students on the same terms as U.S. students.
You can study at Yale or audit courses without matriculating through these special programs.
These courses are open to students from Yale and beyond, as well as high school juniors and adult learners.
See how our World Fellows Program is fostering a new kind of global leadership.
Yale has met or exceeded all of its goals as part of President Barack Obama and First Lady Michelle Obama’s Call to Action on College Opportunity.
